MethodNotAllowed.description: Method Not Allowed. The request method is known by the server but has been disabled and cannot be used.

status.description: Indicates whether the request was unsuccessful.

message.description: A brief description of the error, if any.
message.example: Method Not Allowed. The request method is known by the server but has been disabled and cannot be used.

error.description: Additional information about the error, if available.

status_code.description: The HTTP status code indicating a method not allowed error.
